jd: From: Abhishek Choudhary, Appian Infotech abhishek.c@appianinfotech.com Reply to: abhishek.c@appianinfotech.com Job Title: AWS Cloud Expert & Storage Expert Location: REMOTEDuration: Long term Contract W2_C2C Architecture Design:Design and implement the architecture for Lustre file systems and AWS FSx for ONTAP, ensuring scalability, reliability, and high performance to meet analytical workload demands.Lustre File System Management:Configure, maintain, and optimize Lustre file systems to support high-performance data access and storage for analytical applications.AWS FSx for ONTAP Integration:Design and implement the integration of AWS FSx for ONTAP into the existing statistical computing environment, ensuring compatibility and performance requirements are met.Data Migration Planning:Develop and execute comprehensive migration plans for transitioning data from Lustre file systems to AWS FSx for ONTAP, minimizing downtime and ensuring data integrity.Performance Optimization Monitoring:Continuously monitor the performance of both Lustre and AWS FSx for ONTAP systems, identifying and implementing solutions to enhance efficiency and response times.
